title: Sikh Gurdwaras (Supplementary) Act, 1925
description: Official consolidated text of Sikh Gurdwaras (Supplementary) Act, 1925 (XXIV of 1925) published by The Pakistan Code (Islamic/Religious Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
_(1) This Act may be called the Sikh Gurdwaras (Supplementary)
Act, 1925.
(2) It shall come into force on the date 2appointed by the 3[Provincial Government] under sub-section
(3) of section 1 of the Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925(Punjab Act VIII of 1925).

provisions.title: Section 2. Validation of certain provisions of Punjab Act VIII of 1925
provisions.content:
_The Sikh Gurdwaras Act, 1925
(hereinafter referred to as the said Act), shall, so far as it adds to or takes from the jurisdiction of the
High Court 4[* *] at Lahore or prescribes the procedure of the said Court, be as valid as if it had been
passed by the 5[Central Legislature].

provisions.title: Section 3. 6[Repealed]
provisions.content:
________

3

4
Omitted by Central Adaptation of Laws Order, 1964(P. O. 1 of 1964), Art. 2 and Sch.
